name: Assassin's Creed III: The Hidden Secrets Pack
name_original: Assassin's Creed III: The Hidden Secrets Pack
description:
Assassin's Creed III: The Hidden Secrets Pack is an action game developed by Ubisoft Quebec. It came out on 11-12-2012. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Assassin's Creed III: The Hidden Secrets Pack is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
